sentence.Network_en: We attended evensong as well as morning service.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们参加了晚祷和晨祷.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 轻音乐下载_百度知道 ... 7.Elan 热忱 8.Evensong 晚祷 9.In our tears 我们泪盈盈.
英语词典查询：even ... evens 【英】同额赌注详细 evensong 晚祷;晚课详细 even-steven 【口】机会相等;互不相欠详细.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ǣfensang, originally applied to the pre-Reformation service of vespers (see even, song)

entry.def: Evensong is the evening service in the Anglican Church.

means.word_mean: 1. the sixth of the seven canonical hours of the divine office; early evening; now often made a public service on Sundays
2. (Anglican Church) a daily evening service with prayers prescribed in the Book of Common Prayer

auth_sentence.content: The wireless relaying evensong from Canterbury Cathedral.
auth_sentence.res_content: The wireless relaying evensong from Canterbury Cathedral.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The wireless relaying evensong from Canterbury Cathedral.

auth_sentence.content: This night, after evensong, a man in his fifties came and sat with me.
auth_sentence.res_content: This night, after evensong, a man in his fifties came and sat with me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This night, after evensong, a man in his fifties came and sat with me.

auth_sentence.content: Once, after supper, my father swept me up into his black seminarian's cape and across the street for Evensong.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once, after supper, my father swept me up into his black seminarian's cape and across the street for Evensong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once, after supper, my father swept me up into his black seminarian's cape and across the street for Evensong.
